text: Devils Back in Massachusetts, USA, is a very small and barren rock in the Atlantic Ocean located within the city limits of Boston. The rock is northeast of Aldridge Ledge, southwest of Commissioners Ledge, northwest of Half Tide Rocks, west of Green Island, and just east of the South Channel. Category:Islands of Massachusetts Category:Landforms of Boston Category:Islands of Suffolk County, Massachusetts Category:Coastal islands of Massachusetts
title: Devils Back
